state_description: Initial screen for CleanMyMac X where users can start a Smart Scan to clean, optimize, and protect their Mac.

enables.name: Start Smart Scan
enables.description: Initiates a comprehensive scan of the Mac to clean junk files, optimize performance, and check for malware.

enables.name: Access System Junk
enables.description: Navigate to the System Junk module to clean unnecessary system files.

enables.name: Access Mail Attachments
enables.description: Navigate to the Mail Attachments module to clean up old mail attachments.

enables.name: Access Trash Bins
enables.description: Navigate to the Trash Bins module to empty trash bins and free up space.

enables.name: Access Malware Removal
enables.description: Navigate to the Malware Removal module to scan and remove malware.

enables.name: Access Privacy
enables.description: Navigate to the Privacy module to manage privacy settings and remove traces of online activity.

enables.name: Access Optimization
enables.description: Navigate to the Optimization module to improve system performance.

enables.name: Access Maintenance
enables.description: Navigate to the Maintenance module for system maintenance tasks.

enables.name: Access Uninstaller
enables.description: Navigate to the Uninstaller module to remove applications completely.

enables.name: Access Updater
enables.description: Navigate to the Updater module to update applications.

enables.name: Access Extensions
enables.description: Navigate to the Extensions module to manage browser and system extensions.

enables.name: Access Space Lens
enables.description: Navigate to the Space Lens module to visualize disk space usage.

enables.name: Access Large & Old Files
enables.description: Navigate to the Large & Old Files module to find and remove large or old files.

enables.name: Access Shredder
enables.description: Navigate to the Shredder module to securely delete files.
